review: Wasn't expecting to find this as addicting as I have. Farewell social life, it was nice having you back for a while :P
All we had to do was follow the damn train, CJ!

I actually really liked this game. I like how it pays homage to what it's influenced by, like Stephen King novels, the Twilight Zone, Twin Peaks etc. Some of the mechanics are a little annoying, but I found the story unique and engaging enough to distract me from that. I recommend that you treat this game as more a supernatural/drama/thriller rather than a horror. While it might have it's moments (I stress the word 'might') it's a game about a horror story, not an actual horror game :D
You're going to need to scrape your brain off the wall after this one :D
Its free to play now, YOU HAVE NO EXCUSE!
